pullrequest.title: Update windows build scripts for gazebo11

content.raw:
I’m unable to detect where are we using jsoncpp. The [first error in that build ](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2622/consoleFull#-18989436798ff58640-3599-4406-a210-216932f1748c)appears in ign-common compilation \(internal compiler error\). Not sure if it could be related or we have changed something depending on jsoncpp.

I’m going to merge these changes now since it improves the situation although we need more work to make the builds to pass and make the test for vs2019 easier.

‌
